entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 4 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning this evening. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
